* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").

- *For the monster in SpliceHack and Hack'EM, see [Selkie (SpliceHack)](/index.php?title=Selkie_\(SpliceHack\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Selkie (SpliceHack) (page does not exist)").*

A **selkie**, n, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). Selkies are [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong") [nymphs](/wiki/Nymph_\(monster_class\) "Nymph (monster class)") that can be seen via [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision") - a selkie can shapeshift into the form of a **seal**, d, and will seek out [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item") and other objects to collect.

A selkie has a single weapon attack and a seduction attack that can steal items. In seal form, they have a strong bite attack.

## Generation

Selkies are only generated in the [Mithardir Quest](/wiki/Mithardir_Quest "Mithardir Quest"), where they can appear as a special type of [shopkeeper](/wiki/Shopkeeper "Shopkeeper") that sells adventuring equipment.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Selkie_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

Selkie (dNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
n selkie (No tile)
Difficulty 18
Attacks Weapon 4d4 physical, Claw 0d0 seduction
n selkie (No tile)
Difficulty 18
Attacks

Weapon 4d4 physical, Claw 0d0 seduction

Base level 15
Base experience 441
Speed 18
Base AC 0
Base MR 50
Alignment -9 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium

A selkie:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • can be seen through infravision.

Alignment -9 (chaotic)

Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium

A seal:

  • has no hands.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • can be seen through infravision.

For the monster in SpliceHack and Hack'EM, see Selkie (SpliceHack).

A selkie, n, is a type of monster that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. Selkies are strong nymphs that can be seen via infravision - a selkie can shapeshift into the form of a seal, d, and will seek out magical items and other objects to collect.

A selkie has a single weapon attack and a seduction attack that can steal items. In seal form, they have a strong bite attack.

Generation

Selkies are only generated in the Mithardir Quest, where they can appear as a special type of shopkeeper that sells adventuring equipment.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

{{for|the monster in SpliceHack and Hack'EM|Selkie (SpliceHack)}}

A '''selkie''', {{brown|n}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]]. Selkies are [[strong]] [[Nymph (monster class)|nymphs]] that can be seen via [[infravision]] - a selkie can shapeshift into the form of a '''seal''', {{brown|d}}, and will seek out [[magical item]]s and other objects to collect.

A selkie has a single weapon attack and a seduction attack that can steal items. In seal form, they have a strong bite attack.

==Generation==
Selkies are only generated in the [[Mithardir Quest]], where they can appear as a special type of [[shopkeeper]] that sells adventuring equipment.
